observation.reason: The website has multiple characteristics of a scam website. For example the website has unusually low prices (-20% and -40%) and it claims to offer free shipping and a 100% secure payment. The website also lacks company information and its privacy policy is ambiguous. Furthermore the website has no social media presence and has not been reviewed by any reputable sources.
